snippet: Wide receiver Victor Cruz, defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul and fullback Henry Hynoski returned to practice for the Giants, with Cruz saying he expected to play Sunday against the Cowboys.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants wide receiver Victor Cruz, who has been out with bruised heel, returns to practice and expects to play in team's season opener against Dallas Cowboys; other football news noted.

byline.original: By BILL PENNINGTON and BEN SHPIGEL

lead_paragraph: Wide receiver Victor Cruz, defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul and fullback Henry Hynoski returned to practice for the Giants, with Cruz saying he expected to play Sunday against the Cowboys.

headline.main: Cruz Expects to Be Ready for Opener
headline.print_headline: Cruz Expects To Be Ready For Opener
